notes.text:
This update for libssh fixes the following issues:

- CVE-2018-10933: Fixed a server mode authentication bypass (bsc#1108020).
notes.title: Description of the patch

notes.text: A vulnerability was found in libssh's server-side state machine before versions 0.7.6 and 0.8.4. A malicious client could create channels without first performing authentication, resulting in unauthorized access.
notes.title: Vulnerability description
